synopsis.text: When Kasumi Haruno, a young fourth-grader, bids farewell to her zoologist parents as they embark on a research expedition to Africa, she finds herself in the heart of Kasumi Town, nestled within a dense forest. Her new abode is the grand Kasumi family mansion, where she is greeted by an unusual assortment of talking household objects. As Kasumi acclimates to her new surroundings, she learns that these objects are known as Henamon, magical creatures of the Kasumi family. In exchange for residing with the family, Kasumi takes on various household chores, including cooking and cleaning. Amidst the enchanting aura of the mansion and its peculiar inhabitants, Kasumi's life takes an unexpected turn, filled with intrigue and mystery. Join Kasumi as she embarks on a thrilling adventure, navigating her new life with the magical Henamon and the friends she meets along the way.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
